p: Ketamine hydrochloride (Neon Laboratories Limited, India), furosemide (Changzhou Yabang Pharmaceutical, China), absolute methanol (Alpha Chemika, India), chloroform (Nice Chemicals, India), ethyl acetate (Fine Chem, India), tween 80 (Atlas Chemicals, India), and normal saline (Addis Pharmaceutical Factory, Ethiopia). All the other chemicals used were also laboratory and/or analytical grade.
